place.name: GRAIG
place.gazetteerText: GRAIG, a hamlet in Bassaleg parish, Monmouth; on the Crumlin canal, 3 miles W by N of Newport. Real property, £3, 260. Pop., 684. Houses, 130. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
